name: Mr Jump Run Adventure
description:
Are you a good shooter? Let's find out!
How long Can you Survive?
Collect coins, avoid different obstacles to complete all levels Shoot the enemies otherwise they will kill you.
Grab your Gun; it’s time to move around the world with mr Gun!
Mr Gun is Probably one of the most addictive casual game developed so far On IOS.

Game Features and How to Play:

- Avoid From Deadly Obstacles and Enemies
- Tap and Jump to Move to different hurdles
- Find Key to unlock the door to next level.
- Shoot the enemies to kill them.
- DIFFERENT WORLDS !
- Play for all ages
- High-quality graphics.
- Lightweight Game
- There are many obstacles and height object.
- This game for everyone who loves Mr Gun.
So download Now and Have fun with Mr Gun Boy.
And must leave a good feedback if you love the game.
